name: CHORDOSIS
description:
Dive into Cosmic Horror:
CHORDOSIS invites you to experience a unique cosmic survival sci-fi horror game centered around alien abductions. Immerse yourself in the small village of Dunahont, Hungary, and uncover its chilling mysteries.
Find Your Missing Twin:
Take on the role of Sadie, determined to find her vanished twin sister. Ignored by the authorities, Sadie embarks on a dangerous journey to unravel the truth.
Puzzles and Survival:
Solve intricate physics-based puzzles and manage your inventory creatively. Face the unknown with unique weapons, fighting for survival against the alien threat.
Uncover the Enigma:
Step into a world where the skies are full of secrets and danger lurks everywhere. As Sadie, your mission is clear: find your sister and unearth the hidden truths in the cosmic horror of CHORDOSIS.
